title: Terraria
name: vTerraria
note: Be sure to check the Commands sections under the Advanced tab for configuration! Edit command 1 to change the world name. Edit command 3 to change the world size (1-Small, 2-Medium, 3-Large). Edit command 5 to change the world difficulty (classic.txt, expert.txt, master.txt).

title: tShock
name: tShock
description: A simple tShock Terraria server. It's running the base plugins. More plugin install options to come eventually!
note: PLUGIN SUPPORT HAS YET TO BE IMPLEMENTED! Default plugins will be used! Be sure to check the Commands sections under the Advanced tab for configuration! Edit command 1 to change the world name. Edit command 3 to change the world size (1-Small, 2-Medium, 3-Large). Edit command 5 to change the world difficulty (classic.txt, expert.txt, master.txt).
